channel.title: Need Help With WinRAR [PLEASE HELP!]
channel.description:
Hey, After three days of pausing and un-pausing to go on the internet myself, I FINALLY finished an 8.64GB Download of 26 language courses by Rosetta Stone, on BitLord, from Demonoid. The link for the torrent is here: http://www.demonoid.com/files/details/1062963/5521524/ The install notes are:
INSTALL: Burn or mount. Run the setup.exe file from the DVD2/APPLICATION directory. Insert the DVD containing desired language and run the Rosetta software.
After much a much tedious waiting period, I beamed with pride as BitLord gave the notice that my download had finished. When I went to extract the .iso, it followed through, but at 100%, there was errors. Here are the errors: [IMG]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/7163/errorsyf0.jpg[/img] What gets me is that my hard drive is 232GB, and I have 148GB left. Here's a picture: [IMG]http://img102.imageshack.us/img102/7808/hardrivesw3.jpg[/img] As you can see, I have plenty enough room. I tried opening the .iso's in MagicISO, and all that does is just transfer the files from one place to another. I have Daemon tools and I mounted my drive, and still it won't work. PLEASE help me and don't let the sweet fruits of my labor become sour... [center]Thanks,[/center] Buzzy

item.title: Need Help With WinRAR [PLEASE HELP!]
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Buzzy:

I converted my file system without formatting. I extracted the files and there is no directory with setup.exe in it. I give up. 3 Days wasted

And you just deleted it? …

The program to use the files you got.

The tutorial to the program posted just now.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With WinRAR [PLEASE HELP!]
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

Hey,

 After three days of pausing and un-pausing to go on the internet myself, I FINALLY finished an 8.64GB Download of 26 language courses by Rosetta Stone, on BitLord, from Demonoid.

The link for the torrent is here: http://www.demonoid.com/files/details/1062963/5521524/

The install notes are:

INSTALL:

Burn or mount.
Run the setup.exe file from the DVD2/APPLICATION directory.
Insert the DVD containing desired language and run the Rosetta software.

After much a much tedious waiting period, I beamed with pride as BitLord gave the notice that my download had finished. When I went to extract the .iso, it followed through, but at 100%, there was errors.

Here are the errors:

What gets me is that my hard drive is 232GB, and I have 148GB left.

Here’s a picture:

As you can see, I have plenty enough room. I tried opening the .iso’s in MagicISO, and all that does is just transfer the files from one place to another. I have Daemon tools and I mounted my drive, and still it won’t work. PLEASE help me and don’t let the sweet fruits of my labor become sour…

[center]Thanks,[/center]
Buzzy

Read full topic
